ValidationRule.description: The Omniture Campaign Code field must be populated if the User is ISO Inbound and the Lead Source is Inbound Call
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), ISPICKVAL( LeadSource, 'Inbound Call'), ISBLANK(TEXT(Omniture_Campaign_Code__c)), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "ISO Inbound"), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, ISNEW(), NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An Omniture Campaign Code is required for a Lead Source value of "Inbound Call".
